AT-M42 Client Server Programming for the Java Plaform
======================================================

Case Study 5: Adventure Game with gails
---------------------------------------------------

This folder contains all the examples from [Case study 5](/dokuwiki/at-m42:casestudies:cs05).

### Application properties 

* [application.properties](game/application.properties) &ndash; application.properties file generated by `grails create-app` *game*.
* The Grails application: (http://localhost:8080/game)[http://localhost:8080/game].

### Domain models

* [Item.groovy](game/grails-app/domain/Item.groovy) &ndash; an `Item`.

### Controllers

* [ItemController.groovy](game/grails-app/controllers/ItemController.groovy) &ndash; scaffolded `ItemController` class.

### Views


### Test cases

* [ItemTests.groovy](game/test/unit/ItemTests.groovy) &ndash; test `Item`.
* [ItemControllerTests.groovy](game/test/unit/ItemControllerTests.groovy) &ndash; test `ItemController`.


----
